text: No vehicle shall be or continue to be registered in the name of any person required to file proof of financial responsibility for the future unless such proof shall be furnished for such vehicle.

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Motor Vehicle Owners and Operators Responsibility.

heading.catch_text: Proof required for each registered vehicle.
